roadmap.title: HTML & CSS
roadmap.description: Learn the foundational technologies of the web, HTML for structure and CSS for styling. Master concepts such as semantic HTML, flexbox, grid, and responsive design to build modern web interfaces.

children.title: CSS Preprocessors
children.description: Explore SASS and LESS to enhance styling capabilities with variables, mixins, and nested rules.

children.title: CSS Frameworks
children.description: Understand frameworks like Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, and Material UI for faster and more consistent styling.

children.title: Responsive Design
children.description: Master media queries and mobile-first design principles to create adaptable layouts.

roadmap.title: JavaScript Basics
roadmap.description: Learn JavaScript syntax, ES6+ features, DOM manipulation, event handling, and asynchronous programming concepts.

children.title: JavaScript ES6+
children.description: Explore modern JavaScript features like let/const, template literals, spread/rest operators, and async/await.

children.title: DOM Manipulation
children.description: Understand how to manipulate the DOM using vanilla JavaScript methods and event listeners.

children.title: Asynchronous JavaScript
children.description: Master promises, async/await, and fetch API for handling asynchronous operations.

roadmap.title: Frontend Frameworks
roadmap.description: Learn popular frontend frameworks such as React, Vue, and Angular to build dynamic web applications.

children.title: React.js
children.description: Understand JSX, hooks, component-based architecture, state management, and routing.

children.title: Vue.js
children.description: Learn Vue directives, computed properties, Vue Router, and Vuex for state management.

children.title: Angular
children.description: Get familiar with TypeScript, Angular CLI, dependency injection, and RxJS.
